typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> Source
Source select(mapColumn(
		help,
		success,
		result
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 foldDown(unroll(result.records, result.records),
	mapColumn(
		{_id} = result.records.{_id},
		Ilce = result.records.Ilce,
		{2015} = result.records.{2015.0},
		{2016} = result.records.{2016.0},
		{2017} = result.records.{2017.0},
		{2018} = result.records.{2018.0},
		{2019} = result.records.{2019.0}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
